akn:content.akn:p:
§ 3710. Limitation on authority Nothing in this chapter authorizes the Foundation to perform any function the exclusive authority for which is provided to the National Park Foundation by subchapter II of chapter 1011 of title 54. (Pub. L. 98–244, § 11, as added Pub. L. 106–408, title II, § 208, Nov. 1, 2000, 114 Stat. 1781; amended Pub. L. 113–287, § 5(d)(35), Dec. 19, 2014, 128 Stat. 3267; Pub. L. 116–188, title I, § 107(d), Oct. 30, 2020, 134 Stat. 920.)
Editorial Notes Amendments2020—Pub. L. 116–188 inserted “exclusive” before “authority”. 2014—Pub. L. 113–287 substituted “subchapter II of chapter 1011 of title 54” for “Public Law 90–209 (16 U.S.C. 19e et seq.)”.
